item.title: Math Expressions with Facets in ggplot2
item.description: In this post I show how we can use $\LaTeX$ math expressions to label the panels in facets. The updated version of ggplot2 V 2.0 has improved the way we can label panels in facet plots with the use of a generic labeller function.
